author: Space Wizards
install_msg: Successfully installed the SS14 Game Server Status cog! Please configure it with [p]statuscfg addserver.
name: SS14 and SS13 Game Server Status
short: Shows the status of your SS14 server and a bunch of other stuff.
description: Shows the status of your SS14, SS13, including player count, map, and round status. (and some other game servers that have qstat support)
